statements: DELETE FROM boxing_champions WHERE id = 1 AND nationality = 'USA'
DELETE FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' AND (wins > 50 OR losses > 10)
DELETE FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
DELETE FROM boxing_records WHERE champion_id = 1 AND result = 'Win';
DELETE FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND title_won_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM matches WHERE champion_id = 1 AND result = 'Win';
DELETE FROM boxing_records WHERE champion_id = 3 AND result = 'Loss';
DELETE FROM boxing_titles WHERE champion_id = 5 AND title_name = 'Heavyweight';
